item.title: Indie Web Camp
item.description: A collection of resources for independent web builders, including a wiki for some common terms, a chat community, and lots of resources for indieweb technology.
item.content:encoded: A collection of resources for independent web builders, including a wiki for some common terms, a chat community, and lots of resources for indieweb technology.
